## Función de densidad

$$
f(x) = \displaystyle \frac{\Gamma(\frac{n+1}{2})}{\Gamma(\frac{n}{2})\sqrt{n\pi}}\left( 1 + \frac{x^2}{n} \right)^{-\frac{n+1}{2}}
$$


## Función de distribución

$$
F(x) = \displaystyle \frac{\Gamma(\frac{n+1}{2})}{\Gamma(\frac{n}{2})\sqrt{n\pi}} \int_{-\infty}^x \left( 1 + \frac{t^2}{n} \right)^{-\frac{n+1}{2}}dt
$$

## Media

$$
E[X]=0
$$

## Varianza

$$
Var[X]= \displaystyle \frac{n}{n-2}
$$
